content: I'm looking for some advice on how to improve my car's aerodynamics. I've been thinking of getting a rear spoiler or a front splitter to reduce drag and improve downforce. Do you have any recommendations on what would work best for my 2018 Ford Mustang GT? By the way, I met a mechanic from a local shop at the "Turbocharged Tuesdays" event who gave me some valuable tips on how to improve my car's performance.
